channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware Xenon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware Xenon

item.title: CVE-2017-4952|2024-08-05T14:47:43.298Z -- vmware -- vmware%20xenon
item.description: VMware Xenon 1.x, prior to 1.5.4-CR7_1, 1.5.7_7, 1.5.4-CR6_2, 1.3.7-CR1_2, 1.1.0-CR0-3, 1.1.0-CR3_1,1.4.2-CR4_1, and 1.5.4_8, contains an authentication bypass vulnerability due to insufficient access controls for utility endpoints. Successful exploitation of this issue may result in information disclosure.
